    • Constructor Detail

      • BMDK

        public BMDK()
        BMDK constructor. This will create encryption/decryption keys that persist durring the life of this Class through the live of the Class.

    • Method Detail

      • exportReport

        public java.lang.String exportReport(java.lang.String reportName,
                            BMDK.OutputType outputType)
        Generates a report using Actuate's JSAPI and returns it in the format given via OutputType
        Parameters:
        reportName - Name of the report to be exported. This must be the full path. IE /Home/devSite/test.rptdesign
        outputType - The format the report needs to be rendered in. IE xls, pdf, doc, etc.
        Returns:
        Return's the report as a string for the developer to decide how to handle the contents

      • reportListing

        public java.lang.String reportListing()
        Returns:
        Report listing in the specified volume as HTML string
